description.value:
Melee Attacks suffer -5 to Weapon Skill Tests unless they are Immune to Fear, Beasts, Mechnical Constructs. Wearer gains +10 to Intimidation Tests but suffers -10 to Steath Tests.

Requirements

Often used by Chaos, Consists of Ornate Banners and/or the skulls and helmets of vanquished enemies.

Effect: Very Rare

Notes: -
